meanings.sent1: The chameleon is camouflageable, blending perfectly into its surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers wore camouflageable uniforms to blend in with the forest.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky spy thought he was camouflageable in his bright red suit.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to adapt and be camouflageable in any situation amazed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The octopus's camouflageable skills were truly remarkable, fooling even the keenest eyes.

meanings.definition: Capable of being disguised or hidden.
meanings.sent1: The secret door was so well camouflageable that no one noticed it.
meanings.sent2: The thief used a camouflageable mask to hide his identity.
meanings.sent3: The magician's disappearing act was so good, it was almost camouflageable.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were camouflageable behind a smile, hiding her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden in a camouflageable spot, waiting to be discovered.
